function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Multizone situation created by opening windows allows for the rapid spread of contaminants","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission within the house","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation and air filtration systems to minimize the spread of contaminants","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems, and natural ventilation strategies","People":"Household members and visitors within the house","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Different tracer concentrations in multiple compartments can lead to uneven distribution of contaminants","Impact":"Uneven distribution of contaminants can result in localized areas of high exposure to airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Use of computational fluid dynamics (CFD) modeling and airflow analysis to optimize ventilation and airflow patterns","Technologies":"CFD simulation software, airflow sensors, and smart ventilation control systems","People":"Household members and visitors within the house","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and ventilation system engineers"}]}
